/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly in the background, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street itself is lined with trees and lampposts, adding a touch of greenery to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars and buses can be seen on the road, going about their daily routines. The image is a snapshot of urban life in Beijing, encapsulating the city's vibrant energy and architectural grandeur.
